intro: Streptolirion elegans, commonly known as the elegant streptolirion, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to southern Africa. It features slender, upright stems that bear clusters of small, delicate flowers in shades of pink and white. The plant has lance-shaped leaves that are usually covered in fine hairs, giving it a soft texture. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and borders. Its unique floral display and compact growth habit make it an attractive addition to both cultivated and natural landscapes.
